attributes.action: continue to make paying Income Tax compulsory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If it were made voluntary, as most tax-payers would probably like, how many would continue to pay it?  Very few, I imagine, which would mean that either those who did have enough of a social conscience to continue paying would be taxed exorbitantly or far fewer services could be funded.  Payment of Income Tax, however unpalatable, HAS to continue to be compulsory or how will public services, such as education, the N.H.S., etc, be funded?

rejection.details: Your petition is based on a false premise - there are no plans to make income tax voluntary.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
